description:
A set of swimsuits for Sophie, Plachta, Ramizel, Alette, Olias, and Diebold, based on designs from past Atelier titles.

Featured costumes:
- Sophie: Passionate Soleil – New
- Plachta: Black Monokini - New
- Ramizel: Night Onyx – New
- Alette: Glazed Coral – New
- Olias: Capped Captain – New
- Diebold: Seaside Paladin - New

※ The name of the swimsuit was changed from "Elegant Mermaid - New" to "Black Monokini - New".
Note: Costumes can be changed in the "Changing Room" at the desk in the atelier.
Please visit the official website for more information. 
This DLC is only available to users who have purchased "Atelier Sophie 2: The Alchemist of the Mysterious Dream Digital Deluxe Edition" or "Atelier Sophie 2: The Alchemist of the Mysterious Dream Ultimate Edition".
name: Atelier Series Legacy Swimsuit Set
